thread.title: Top political and military minds join Crystal Cruises fall voyages
thread.title_full: Top political and military minds join Crystal Cruises fall voyages

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Top political and military minds join Crystal Cruises fall voyages
text:
Top political and military minds join Crystal Cruises fall voyages Adv: Senator Scott Brown – Retired U.S. Senator from Massachusetts and Army Colonel Adv: 
LOS ANGELES, CA - Aboard five ultra-luxury cruises this fall and winter, inquisitive travelers can engage with some of the world's top political and military minds. Crystal Cruises' Crystal Visions Enrichment Program will present interactive and entertaining lectures, discussions and even debates with US senators, state and military leaders as they weigh in on the most pressing issues facing the world today. Sailing aboard Crystal Symphony and Crystal Serenity in the Mediterranean and Caribbean, the experts include: 
• Senator Scott Brown – Retired U.S. Senator from Massachusetts and Army Colonel, now working as a political correspondent for a major news network (Crystal Symphony, November 14 Caribbean voyage); 
• General Anthony Zinni (Ret.) – Decorated 39-year U.S. military veteran leading troops in over 70 countries; now also an acclaimed author and diplomat (Crystal Serenity, October 18 and 25 Mediterranean voyages); 
• Governor Bob Graham – The 38th Governor of Florida and subsequent U.S. Senator now focusing on public service through his alma mater, the University of Florida (Crystal Serenity, November 29 Mediterranean voyage); and 
• Senator Alan Simpson and Norman Mineta – The former senior senator from Wyoming and the Secretary of Transportation for both Presidents Bill Clinton and George W. Bush, respectively (Crystal Symphony, November 28 Caribbean voyage) 
"Our guests are savvy world travelers who relish stimulating and thought-provoking enrichment, and have come to expect that in spades from Crystal," says Edie Rodriguez, Crystal's president and CEO. "With so many riveting headlines and events happening – especially as we move into an election year – these guest speakers will provide fascinating and timely insights and certainly promote some lively conversations."
